					<style id="wp-custom-css">
			/* Make popups white by default */
.dialog-widget-content {
	background-color: white;
}

.noMargin p {
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    line-height: 16px;
}

/* Linked SVG fix */
.elementor-widget-image .elementor-image>a img[src$=".svg"], .elementor-widget-image .elementor-image img[src$=".svg"] {
    width: 100%;
}

@-moz-document url-prefix() {
    .elementor-widget-image .elementor-image>a img[src$=".svg"], .elementor-widget-image .elementor-image figure>a img[src$=".svg"] {
			width: 9999px;
	}
}

/* body font size */
body {
	font-size: 24px;
}

p {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Button font size */
.elementor-button.elementor-size-lg {
	font-size: 32px;
}

/* iframe modal styling */
#vh-message{ height: 100%; left: 0; position: fixed; top: 0; width: 100%;}
#vh-message .vh-container{ width: 50%; left: 25%; position: fixed; top: 20%; z-index: 10; min-width: 250px;}
#vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal { padding: 1.2rem; background: #fff; height: 100%; left: -50%; top: -50%; width: 100%; min-height: 100px;}
#vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal .vh-logo { position: relative; }
#vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal p { font-size: 1.7rem; overflow: auto; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;}
#vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal img { z-index: 10; right: 10px; height:100px;}
#vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal button { bottom: 20px; z-index: 10; min-width: 1em; min-height:90px; padding:20px; border: 1px solid #B8232F; color: #B8232F; font-size: 2rem; cursor: pointer; }
#vh-message .vh-bg{ background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); height: 100%; left: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 9; }
@media only screen and (min-device-width: 375px) and (max-width: 812px){
  #vh-message .vh-container { width: 75%; left: 10%; position: fixed; top: 10%; z-index: 10; }
  #vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal p { font-size: 1.2rem; overflow: auto; margin: 0.6rem; }
  #vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal button {min-height: 60px; font-size: 1.5rem;}
  #vh-message .vh-container .vh-modal img {height: 75px;}
} 

/* adds underline to all links */
.elementor a {
    text-decoration: underline;
}		</style>
